name: Stickman Neon Run
description:
The Stickman Neon Run 2017 game can be of interest to absolutely any person, the age varies from children from 3 years to infinity. In the game, you need to show attention, character and perseverance, which will overcome each of the levels in a pleasant neon world!

  • Features, now the game contains:
  • - 14 levels and 1 level of long level on the complexity of Ultra!
  • - Neon graphics!
  • - Cool music!
  • - Stickman White!
  • - An interesting atmosphere!
